channel.title: Static Blog
channel.description: A static blog built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

item.title: How to Use the Admin Panel
item.description: The admin panel allows you to manage your blog posts without needing a backend. Here's how to use it.

item.title: Welcome to Static Blog
item.description: This is an example post for your static blog. You can write your posts in Markdown format, and they will be automatically converted to HTML when displayed on your blog.
